Hab 1.5k Stunden damit verbracht sämtliche Server auszuprobieren sowohl Offizielle, wie auch private. (~700h official und den Rest private). Und somit denke ich kann ich sagen das dieses Spiel einfach der Hammer ist. Ich liebe es einfach, klar gibt es auch Phasen wo ich gar nicht gespielt habe aber das waren Maximal 1/2 Monate. Ein kauf ist empfehlenswert!

Oyunu tavsiye ediyorum ve CS:GO Türkleri çok sarıyor. Fakat troll Ruslara rekabetçi maçlarda denk gelmekten bir zaman sonra bıkıyorsunuz bu yüzden Türklerin veya Rusların kendilerine özel server açmasını istiyorum ama sınav zamanında oynamayın batırıyor benden söylemesi :)

I wish there was a mixed button because its a mixed bag and allways has been since I started way to many years ago.
- Still no dedicated Russian servers meaning EU servers have a lot of Russians on them meaning that comunication can be hard at times.
- Cheaters are still a thing but not as bad as they used to be.
- Net code & hit detection are still off.
- It's soul crushing (but can also be increadably rewarding however those moments importants have faded over time for me)
- I do NOT have many issues with toxic people but the toxic people I do encounter are increadably toxic
- Do you trust, trust factor?
... and my team allways sucks, I honestly mean it :P

jogo muito bom para quem gosta de fps

The game pits two teams against each other: the Terrorists and the Counter-Terrorists. Both sides are tasked with eliminating the other while also completing separate objectives. The Terrorists, depending on the game mode, must either plant the bomb or defend the hostages, while the Counter-Terrorists must either prevent the bomb from being planted, defuse the bomb, or rescue the hostages. There are nine game modes, all of which have distinct characteristics specific to that mode.
